```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(0., 10., 1000)
>>> int_j, int_y = it2j0y0(x)
>>> ax.plot(x, int_j, label=r"$\int_0^x \frac{1-J_0(t)}{t}\,dt$")
>>> ax.plot(x, int_y, label=r"$\int_x^{\infty} \frac{Y_0(t)}{t}\,dt$")
>>> ax.legend()
>>> ax.set_ylim(-2.5, 2.5)
>>> plt.show()
```
